survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Home Security Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, concerns, and adoption factors related to smart home security systems to help manufacturers and service providers tailor their offerings.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart home security features do you currently use or have installed in your home?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Consider randomizing option order to minimize bias.
